COMPANY PROFILE: 
 
 FRICK INDIA Ltd. Faridabad is an ISO 9001-2000 certified Company. It has reputed 
name in designing, manufacturing Refrigeration and Air Conditioning Plants. It also 
manufactures of all equipments like Compressors, Condensers, Receivers, Cooling 
tower, Accumulators and Air Handling Units (AHU) etc. The Company having the major 
Customers likes NTPC, NHPC, BHEL, NDDB, Amul Diary and Mother Diary etc. 
 
 
RESPONSIBILITY: 
 
I. 
Review of Design based on design parameters provided by Marketing Division. 
II. Preparation of Drawings, Work order, Bill of materials for manufacturing items. 
III. Preparation of Equipment Layout based on the building layout provided. 
IV. Preparation of Material lists (includes calculation of pipe lengths, Elbows, Valves, 
Flanges, & all other items like Channels, Insulation) as per Design. 
V. Coordinating with Erection department in connection with Installation problems.
